    • Method Detail

      • reinforcementPhase

        void reinforcementPhase(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Country> countryList,
                        Country country,
                        Player currentPlayer,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Country> countryArList,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Country> adjCountryArList)
        This method will responsible for reinforcement phase.
        Parameters:
        countryList - list of country
        country - Selected country.
        currentPlayer - Current player.
        countryArList - List of countries available to player.
        adjCountryArList - List of neighbour countries.

      • attackPhase

        void attackPhase(javafx.scene.control.ListView<Country> conList,
                 javafx.scene.control.ListView<Country> adjConList,
                 PlayerModel playerModel,
                 java.util.List<Player> playerList,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Country> conArList,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Country> adjConArList)
          throws InvalidGameAction
        This method implements the attack phase of the strategy.
        Parameters:
        conList - listview of country which belong to a player
        adjConList - adjacent country listview for a particular country
        playerModel - object of PlayerModel
        playerList - list of players
        conArList - List of country available to player.
        adjConArList - List of adjacent country.
        Throws:
        InvalidGameAction - throws InvalidGameAction if move is not valid

      • fortificationPhase

        boolean fortificationPhase(javafx.scene.control.ListView<Country> selectedCountry,
                           javafx.scene.control.ListView<Country> adjCountry,
                           Player currentPlayer,
                           Map map,
                           java.util.ArrayList<Country> countryArList,
                           java.util.ArrayList<Country> adjCountryArList)
        This method implements the fortification phase of the strategy.
        Parameters:
        selectedCountry - List of selected countries for the fortification phase.
        adjCountry - List of neighbour countries for fortification phase.
        currentPlayer - current player object.
        map - current map loader.
        countryArList - List of countries.
        adjCountryArList - List of neighbour countries.
        Returns:
        Returns true if fortification phase is possible.

        default boolean hasAValidAttackMove(java.util.ArrayList<Country> countries)
        Check if the player has a valid attack move
        Parameters:

        Returns:
